tool_description:
Dynamically Translate between languages with the Translate Plus API. Our API is much cheaper & faster than Google Translate and other translation providers! Get Started Free!
If you are using a very high volume and with our new service, you can translate more efficiently and cost-effectively on https://translateplus.io
title: Translate Plus

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description: Translate any text into more than 100+ languages.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-plus.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-plus.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: detect_language
api_list.description: Our API will detect text and let you know the language name!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-plus.p.rapidapi.com/language_detect"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

}

print(response.json())

api_list.name: supported_languages
api_list.description: The languages which out api supports.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-plus.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-plus.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
